short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension features a collection of adorable photos of Oreo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the Love Oreo Chrome Extension, the perfect way to brighten up your new tab page! This extension features a collection of adorable photos of Oreo, the lovable pup. Each time you open a new tab, a random photo of Oreo will be displayed as the background image, bringing joy and cuteness to your browsing experience. Download Love Oreo now and let this furry friend accompany you on all your web adventures!
